author: STAN CHOE
title: A 10% drop for stocks is scary, but it's not that rare
description: NEW YORK (AP) — The worries rocking Wall Street about interest rates, inflation and now Ukraine have sent the S&P 500 index — the most widely followed measure of the U.S. stock market — tumbling more than 10% from its record.
